entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:17 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 2:17 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 13 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
